name: Firefox: Black or White Icons
description: Choose between all-black or all-white iconsets. Windows only. Compatible with Australis (Firefox 29).
additional_info: (27/01/2014) Added #email-link-button. (27/11/2013) Compatibility with Australis. (04/07/2012) Dropped support for Firefox 12 and older. (11/02/2012) Now works with dropmarkers (Firefox 13+)(see bug #609107). (10/11/2011) Added option to force black icons. (03/09/2011) Fixed a bug with Rainbow Color Tools color picker. (21/08/2011) Fixed a bug with new tab button; fixed tab scroll buttons. (20/08/2011) Fixes for bug #580194 and bug #673164 (thanks user 43231). (15/08/2011) Now works in every toolbar (not just Navigation Toolbar).

discussions.name: Firefox 15, PaleMoon 15, Waterfox 15 does not work
works well, is fully functional or good looking
It's not fully compatible with Australis anymore
Not working in latest version of FireFox
